definition.en: A resource from which this work is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption.
definition.de: Werk(e), auf denen dieses Werk basiert. A resource from which this work is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption.
definition.fr: œuvre ayant servi de base ou de sujet. A resource from which this work is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption.
definition.es: Obra que se utilizó como base. A resource from which this work is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption.
